::: {#hero-heading}


I am a linguist, currently [**Research Associate at Newcastle University**](https://www.ncl.ac.uk/elll/people/profile/giuliamazzola.html), with expertise in Romance languages, corpus linguistics, language variation and change, historical (socio-)linguistics.

My main research topics currently include: 

* clause-combining
* morphosyntactic alternations
* voice-encoding strategies
* stylistic and textual variation
* quantitative methods for corpus linguistics

[Learn more about me &rarr;](/about){.about-links .subtitle}

:::
